Class chessPiece

java.lang.Object
chessPiece
Direct Known Subclasses:
bishop, knight, pawn, rook
public class chessPiece extends Object
Class for the chesspiece

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    chessPiece()
    A default constructor for the chessPiece object sets the piece to a white pawn in coords A,0
    chessPiece(chess_piece_type name, chess_piece_color color, chess_piece_columns column, int row)
    A constructor for the chessPiece object that sets the initial piece info like name , color, x_coord, and y_coord

  • Constructor Details

    • chessPiece

      public chessPiece()
      A default constructor for the chessPiece object sets the piece to a white pawn in coords A,0

    • chessPiece

      public chessPiece(chess_piece_type name, chess_piece_color color, chess_piece_columns column, int row)
      A constructor for the chessPiece object that sets the initial piece info like name , color, x_coord, and y_coord
      Parameters:
      name - a chess piece name that is in the chess_piece_type enum
      color - a chess piece color that is in the chess_piece_color enum
      x_coord - the initial x coordinate for the piece that is in the chess_piece_columns enum
      y_coord - the initial y coordinate for the piece that is an int

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public chess_piece_type getType()
      getter method that returns the chess piece type
      Returns:
      piece_name a chess piece type that is in the chess_piece_type enum

    • getColor

      public chess_piece_color getColor()
      getter method that returns the chess piece color
      Returns:
      color a chess piece color that is in the chess_piece_color enum

    • getColumn

      public chess_piece_columns getColumn()
      getter method that returns the chess piece column
      Returns:
      column a column that is in the chess_piece_columns enum

    • getRow

      public int getRow()
      getter method that returns the chess piece row
      Returns:
      row an int variable that represents the chess piece row

    • create_chess_piece

      public static chessPiece create_chess_piece(chess_piece_type type, chess_piece_color color, chess_piece_columns column, int row)
      method to create a chesspiece of any specified type that is passed in the parameters
      Parameters:
      type - a chess piece type that is in the chess_piece_type enum
      color - a chess piece color that is in the chess_piece_color enum
      column - the initial column value for the piece that is in the chess_piece_columns enum
      row - the initial row value for the piece that is an int
      Returns:
      chessPiece a chesspiece of the specified type that contains all the values passed in the parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a value passed in the parameters does not exist in the enums for the value

    • verifyTarget

      public Boolean verifyTarget(chess_piece_columns column, int row)
      Method that will return a boolean saying if the piece move passed in is within the chessboard THIS METHOD IS ALWAYS OVERRIDDEN IN ALL CLASSES THAT USE IT
      Parameters:
      column - a new column which the piece will try to move to
      row - a new row which the piece will try to move to
      Returns:
      true if the move is within the chessboard bounds
